Date: Daily Service Report for Thursday, August 6, 2015
Incident: 5:21 a.m.  A non-passenger train derailed between Smithsonian and Federal Triangle stations. Smithsonian and Federal Triangle stations were closed. Shuttle bus service was provided. Silver Line trains operated between Wiehle-Reston East and East Falls Church only. At approximately 2:20 p.m. Orange and Blue line trains began single tracking between McPherson Square and Federal Center SW. Smithsonian and Federal Triangle stations remained closed, and Silver Line trains ran between Wiehle-Reston East and East Falls Church only. At 8:00 p.m. Smithsonian and Federal Triangle stations reopened. Single track service continued through the remainder of the service day. Passengers experienced significant delays and crowding.
